verse:
एको वशी सर्वभूतान्तरात्मा एकं रूपं बहुधा यः करोति।
तमात्मस्थं येऽनुपश्यन्ति धीरास्तेषां सुखं शाश्वतं नेतरेषाम्‌ ॥

learning.तमात्मस्थं: Realizing God is dwelling within me, Absorbed in God, Situated in God

terms.एको वशी सर्वभूतान्तरात्मा: The solitary one, the Supreme Soul, who resides within all beings,
terms.एकं रूपं बहुधा यः करोति: assumes many forms according to His will,
terms.तमात्मस्थं येऽनुपश्यन्ति धीरास्तेषां सुख: Those noble individuals who perceive Him/see him dwelling within themselves, find eternal and supreme bliss, unlike others.

meaning: Meaning:This verse describes the qualities and nature of the Supreme Soul. It states that the Supreme Soul is singular and omnipresent, residing within all beings. It further states that the Supreme Soul assumes various forms according to His will. Those wise individuals who are able to perceive His presence within themselves experience eternal and supreme happiness, unlike those who are oblivious to His existence.

upanishad-org.meaning: One calm and controlling Spirit within all creatures that maketh one form into many fashions; the calm and strong who see Him in the self as in a mirror, theirs is eternal felicity and ‘tis not for others.
